name: Bitcoin VR
description: Ever wanted to see real time bitcoin transaction in VR? Ever wanted to prune the blockchain with a bow and arrow? Enter the forest of satoshi!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 GB available space
